## Overview

In this lesson, we'll explore some advanced git concepts and how to troubleshoot them when things are not working properly.



## Learning Objectives

-   Students will understand and be able to run some advanced Git functions using the terminal.

-   Students will be able to resolve some conflicts that come up while using Git.
